00020 class VariableAttributeListener
00021 {
00022 public:
00023     VariableAttributeListener();
00024 
00026     virtual ~VariableAttributeListener();
00027 
00028 private:
00029     // To prevent usuage of SetUSerData from the user side
00030     friend class VariableAttribute;
00031     friend class ControlServer;
00032     friend class Service;
00033     friend class ServiceProxy;

00035     friend class RemoteVariableChangeListener;

00037     // Get and Set user data

00040 
00041 protected:
00042     virtual void VariableChanged( VariableAttribute * ChangedVariable ) = 0;

00044

00046     void * UserData;
